https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/riBl1LficwmTi8alWEmlHFrCiKK.jpg A diabolical plot to empower pushover dads causes Shin-chan's father to return home as a robot. The Nohara family bond is about to be put to the test! Crayon Shin-chan: Intense Battle! Robo Dad Strikes Back
